channel.title: Separating Magic from Client.java?
channel.description:
How would i go about separating all of my code on magic from my client.java to a new file possibly magic.java?
P.S. if anyone knew a source that has already done this i am sure i could figure out how they did it

item.title: Separating Magic from Client.java?
item.dc:creator: @wat72 wat72
item.description:
@wat72 wrote:

Make a new class that either extends or implements the client class (I’m not sure which), create imports (you might not have to, I’m not completely sure) and c+p the code.

Read full topic
